channel.title: Nokia Technologies on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Nokia Technologies on FinanClub

item.title: NOK
item.description: score:27 Chances: Nokia is actively managing its Cloud and Network Services (CNS) business group portfolio in order to invest in other strategic areas and enhance technology leadership. Nokia Technologies segment is expanding its patent licensing business and reintroducing the Nokia brand to smartphones through brand licensing.
